message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Broad midcap strength led by Financials and Exchanges. LTF posted a strong trend day closing above 300 on very high volume; BSE printed a wide‑range bullish candle closing near the day’s high. PSU banks (UNIONBANK/INDIANB/IDBI) firm; Metals (SAIL/HINDCOPPER) showed momentum; Depositories/Exchanges (CDSL/MCX/BSE) strong. IT mixed to soft (PERSISTENT/MPHASIS faded), Renewables (WAAREEENER) weak. Portfolio +5.8% total P&L with LTF and BSE driving gains. No emergency trades needed; plan to rebalance and add selectively on Monday if setups confirm.",
  "top_signals": [
    {
      "symbol": "LTF",
      "signal": "Trim/Trail",
      "reason": "Breakout and close above 300 on very high volume; position is 33% of portfolio. Book partial profits Monday (sell 5–10 shares near 302–305) and trail the rest with stop ~290.",
      "price": 303.6
    },
    {
      "symbol": "BSE",
      "signal": "Add on retest / Hold",
      "reason": "Wide-range bullish breakout day with heavy volume; exchange/depository theme strong. Consider 1 add on a pullback to 2610–2630 or on breakout above 2719; stop for new add ~2575.",
      "price": 2678.3
    },
    {
      "symbol": "ABCAPITAL",
      "signal": "Buy on retest",
      "reason": "Closed back above the 335–340 resistance zone on strong volume; look to enter on a retest of 335–340 with stop ~324.",
      "price": 338.1
    },
    {
      "symbol": "HINDCOPPER",
      "signal": "Buy on dips",
      "reason": "Metals showing relative strength; strong close near highs. Buy 326–333 with stop ~312 for momentum continuation.",
      "price": 332.8
    },
    {
      "symbol": "CDSL",
      "signal": "Buy on retest",
      "reason": "Breakout toward 1600+ with volume; pairs well with existing BSE exposure. Prefer entries 1550–1575; stop ~1495.",
      "price": 1578.8
    },
    {
      "symbol": "SAIL",
      "signal": "Buy on dips",
      "reason": "Momentum continuation in metals; sustained close near highs. Prefer entries 137–140; stop ~132.",
      "price": 141.0
    },
    {
      "symbol": "BEL",
      "signal": "Hold",
      "reason": "Recovered intraday and closed near highs; maintain with risk control. Stop ~402 to protect capital.",
      "price": 414.25
    },
    {
      "symbol": "LAURUSLABS",
      "signal": "Hold/Add above 990",
      "reason": "Steady uptrend; close near highs. Consider small add only on strength above 990 with stop ~960.",
      "price": 982.15
    },
    {
      "symbol": "IDBI",
      "signal": "Hold/Add on dips",
      "reason": "Regained 100 handle with PSU bank strength. Add 97.5–99 if available; stop ~95.5.",
      "price": 100.42
    },
    {
      "symbol": "WAAREEENER",
      "signal": "Avoid for now",
      "reason": "Bearish close near day’s low after early strength; wait for stabilization back above 3320 before considering longs.",
      "price": 3276.2
    }
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 806.3,
    "total_value": 27466.75,
    "holdings_count": 6,
    "holdings": [
      "BSE: 1 units @ 2385.00 (LTP 2678.30)",
      "LTF: 30 units @ 266.26 (LTP 303.60)",
      "BEL: 20 units @ 419.45 (LTP 414.25)",
      "LAURUSLABS: 3 units @ 900.05 (LTP 982.15)",
      "BHEL: 10 units @ 265.49 (LTP 263.85)",
      "IDBI: 10 units @ 103.80 (LTP 100.42)"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "Position sizing: LTF (33%) and BEL (30%) together are >60% of portfolio. Plan to trim LTF (5–10 shares) Monday to diversify risk.",
    "PSU banks strong: UNIONBANK, INDIANB, IDBI closed near highs; watch for follow‑through Monday. Prefer adds on mild dips rather than gap‑ups.",
    "Metals momentum: SAIL and HINDCOPPER showed strength; consider staggered buys on dips with tight stops to manage volatility.",
    "Depository/Exchange theme: BSE, CDSL, MCX strong. Prefer CDSL on a pullback 1550–1575; add BSE only on retest or fresh breakout.",
    "Renewables mixed: WAAREEENER weak (close near low); KPIGREEN firmer but inside range. Avoid fresh buys in WAAREEENER until it reclaims 3320.",
    "IT soft-to-mixed: PERSISTENT/MPHASIS faded from highs; COFORGE stable but not expanding. Avoid chasing IT until strength returns.",
    "Hospitals/Healthcare: FORTIS firm; APOLLOHOSP saw a sharp fade from highs. For LAURUSLABS, keep stop ~960; add only above 990.",
    "Capital goods/Industrial: BHEL green close; hold with stop ~255. ABB/CUMMINS showed intraday weakness; avoid fresh entries there for now.",
    "Financials ex‑banks: ABCAPITAL strong reclaim of 335–340; potential add candidate if we free cash from LTF trim.",
    "If Monday opens with broad market gap down >0.7%, delay new buys and let first 30–45 minutes establish ranges; use pullback entries only.",
    "Risk controls (indicative stops): LTF 290 (trail), BSE 2575 (new adds), BEL 402, LAURUS 960, BHEL 255, IDBI 95.5.",
    "Liquidity check: Today’s leaders carried strong volumes (LTF, BSE, ABCAPITAL, SAIL/HINDCOPPER), supporting continuation probability."
  ]
}
